text: Choose the grammatically correct sentence (fix: “He is living here since 2010.”)
options_json: ["He is living here since 2010.","He has been living here since 2010.","he has been living here since 2010.","He  is living here since 2010."]
answer: He has been living here since 2010.
explanation: Correct form: “He has been living here since 2010.”.
